text: The Mayor of the District of Columbia is authorized to refund any license fee or tax, or portion thereof, erroneously paid or collected under this chapter.
historical:

1973 Ed., § 47-2350.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-104, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2801.

DC CODE § 47-2849

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)
